entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
